name: Astral Projection
description: The caster frees the inner/astral body from the physical form; a silver cord links astral and physical bodies. If the cord is severed the caster may die; the physical body lapses into a helpless coma while astral travel occurs.
effects: Astral form can travel separately from body
Physical body is in coma-like trance and vulnerable
Severing the silver cord risks death

name: Chameleon
description: Alters the caster's appearance and coloration to blend with surroundings; used for concealment and stealth.
effects: Grants camouflage and reduced detectability
Useful for infiltration and escape

name: Energy Field
description: Generates a protective energy barrier around the target that resists or negates attacks while active.
effects: Provides an energy barrier against attacks
May absorb or deflect certain damage types

name: Fire Bolt
description: A focused bolt of flame launched at a target, dealing immediate fire damage and capable of igniting flammable materials.
effects: Deals direct fire damage on hit
Can ignite combustibles

name: Levitate
description: Allows the caster or a touched subject to float and move vertically, negating normal gravity effects while active.
effects: Negates gravity for target
Enables vertical movement and hover

name: Magic Net
description: Conjures a semi-material net of magical energy that entangles and restrains targets until they escape or the net is dispelled.
effects: Entangles and restrains targets
May require strength/skill to escape

name: Repel Animals
description: Creates an effect causing animals within the area to avoid or flee the caster, useful for herd-control or avoiding predators.
effects: Causes ambient animals to flee or avoid area
Does not affect humanoids or summoned creatures unless specified

name: Sustain
description: Sustains life functions or ongoing effects on a subject, halting deterioration from toxins, exhaustion, or similar ongoing effects while active.
effects: Halts or slows ongoing harmful effects
Maintains vital functions in hostile environments

name: Trance
description: Induces a meditative/suspended state (death-like or focused trance) to protect from certain effects, prepare psychic work, or enter altered states of consciousness.
effects: Slows metabolism and external effects
Useful as preparation for psychic/astral operations

name: Float in Air
description: Allows the caster to remain suspended in mid-air and move slowly while aloft; essentially a controlled hover.
effects: Grants hovering/slow aerial movement
Does not grant full flight speed (limited maneuverability)
